list_definition.definition: a sieve or other utensil for separating solids from liquids

list_ex_of_english: Is it meant to be a strainer through which the pupils have to pass in order to go from one step in education to a higher step?
Now, take an old spaghetti strainer and put all the wet lift powder into it and squeeze it out onto a paper plate.

The mould is usually a wire mesh that acts as a strainer such that the "furnish" is separated out of the water.

As they hold a cup over the forward edge of a bowl, the mixer squeezes the kava from the restored "fau" strainer into it.
